section_title: REQUEST BY CENTRAL ASIA, THE CAUCASUS, ALBANIA AND MOLDOVA GROUP (CACAM)
actors: Central Asia, Caucasus, Albania and Moldova
sentences: UZBEKISTAN requested a COP decision to enable CACAM to receive financial support and its experts to be nominated and participate in expert groups.
Chair Stoycheva said she would conduct informal consultations on the issue.
enb_long_title: Ninth Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
